languages.text:
The Helbrute's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +1%, and his {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is decreased by −0.5% per stack.
The Helbrute's number of attacks per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} is increased by +1 and his {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} is decreased by −1 for every 10 stacks.
languages.original_text:
За каждый уровень эффекта наносимый хелбрутом {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} увеличивается на 1%, а {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} уменьшается на 0,5%.
За каждые 10 уровней эффекта хелбрут может совершить +1 атаку в {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, а его {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} уменьшается на 1.

traits.locale_text:
The Helbrute's damage is increased by +1%, and his armour is decreased by −0.5% per stack.
The Helbrute's number of attacks per turn is increased by +1 and his deflection is decreased by −1 for every 10 stacks.

The Helbrute's number of attacks per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} is increased by +1 and his {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} is decreased by −1 for every 10 stacks.

The Helbrute's number of attacks per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} is increased by +1 and his {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} is decreased by −1 for every 10 stacks.

languages.text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} del Bruto Infernal aumenta un +1 % y su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} se reduce un −0,5 % por acumulación.
El número de ataques por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del Bruto Infernal aumenta en +1 y su {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} se reduce en −1 por cada 10 acumulaciones.

The Helbrute's number of attacks per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} is increased by +1 and his {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} is decreased by −1 for every 10 stacks.

traits.locale_text:
El daño del Bruto Infernal aumenta un +1 % y su {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} se reduce un −0,5 % por acumulación.
El número de ataques por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del Bruto Infernal aumenta en +1 y su {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} se reduce en −1 por cada 10 acumulaciones.

languages.text:
每层效果使地狱兽造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高1%，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}降低0.5%。
每10层效果会让地狱兽每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}的攻击次数1次，{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}降低1点。

The Helbrute's number of attacks per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} is increased by +1 and his {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} is decreased by −1 for every 10 stacks.

traits.locale_text:
每层效果使地狱兽造成的伤害提高1%，{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}降低0.5%。
每10层效果会让地狱兽每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}的攻击次数1次，{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}降低1点。

languages.text:
Les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} du Métabrutus augmentent de 1 % tandis que sa valeur d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} baisse de 0,5 % par cumul.
Le nombre d'attaques par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du Métabrutus augmente de 1 tandis que sa {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} baisse de 1 tous les 10 cumuls.
languages.original_text:
The Helbrute's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +1%, and his {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is decreased by −0.5% per stack.
The Helbrute's number of attacks per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} is increased by +1 and his {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} is decreased by −1 for every 10 stacks.

traits.locale_text:
Les dégâts du Métabrutus augmentent de +1 % tandis que sa valeur d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} baisse de -0,5 % par cumul.
Le nombre d'attaques par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du Métabrutus augmente de +1 tandis que sa valeur de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} baisse de -1 tous les 10 cumuls.

languages.text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} des Höllenschlächters erhöht sich pro Stapel um +1 %. Seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} reduziert sich um −0,5 %.
Die Anzahl der Angriffe des Höllenschlächters pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} erhöht sich für jeweils 10 Stapel um +1, seine {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} reduziert sich um −1.
languages.original_text:
The Helbrute's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +1%, and his {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is decreased by −0.5% per stack.
The Helbrute's number of attacks per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} is increased by +1 and his {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} is decreased by −1 for every 10 stacks.

traits.locale_text:
Der Schaden des Höllenschlächters erhöht sich pro Addition um +1 %, und seine {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Runde{/g} reduziert sich um −0.5 %.
Die Anzahl der Angriffe des Höllenschlächters pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} erhöht sich für alle 10 Additionen um +1, seine {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} reduziert sich um −1.

languages.text:
ヘルブルートの{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が +1%上昇し、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}は累積するたびに −0.5%減少する。
ヘルブルートの1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}あたりの攻撃回数 が+1増加し、{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}は10回累積するごとに −1減少する。
